basic.description: This course provides an opportunity for students to engage in independent and original research in a specialized area beyond the current curriculum in information technology. To graduate with honors in information studies, the student must complete six semester hours of coursework with at least a "B-" or better and an overall 3.2 GPA or higher.
basic.subject: LIS
basic.title: Honors Work in Information Studies

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisites: Admission to the honors program and information-technology major status.
